reviewtext: With only a quick reference to the quickstart guide I took it out of the box, hooked in my PC with WinXP, PC with RedHat Linux, a Laptop running WinXP and a DSL Modem, and everything connected up first time, and stayed that way.I did download and run the lastest firmware upgrade from the LinkSys website just to be sure all known problems were fixed....and after 3 months, still no problems.
